This board meets twice a year to:   Provide external feedback on areas of curriculum improvement to better prepare our students  Participate in long-range strategic planning  Solicit funding to support facilities, research, scholarships, chaired professorships, and other initiatives  Support career placement and participate in student events   The advisory board meets twice a year, usually in October and May, on the UIC campus.
